text: Radu Scârneci (20 September 1926 − 3 August 2015)A murit cel mai vechi locuitor din Poiana Braşov, Monitorul Expres, 3 August 2015.Note that the obituary was published on 3 August; the death may have occurred a couple days earlier. was a Romanian alpine skier. He competed at the 1948 Winter Olympics and the 1952 Winter Olympics. He was the first permanent resident of Poiana Brașov ski resort; the house built in 1933 by his father is the oldest residential house in Poiana Brașov, and is still standing. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Romanian male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Romania Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Brașov
title: Radu Scîrneci
